dc:title: On Pilgrimage - July/August 1950
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes the work, inconvenience, and grateful anticipation of their move to a new house on Christie Street. Includes an account of an all-night pilgrimage to the shrine of our Lady of Mt. Carmel.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 612 1950-07-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
